translations: adj.珍贵的；珍珠似的；生产珍珠的；用珍珠装饰的

sentences.sentence: At night, these streets are brilliant with the pearly radiance of electricity.
sentences.translation: 夜里，电力珍珠般的光辉使这些街道一片明亮。

sentences.sentence: Read on to find out what you can do to keep your pearly white teeth sparkling.
sentences.translation: 继续往下读，看看你能做些什么来让你珍珠般洁白的牙齿闪闪发光。

sentences.sentence: A flashing set of healthy and clean, regular 'pearly whites' was a rare sight in Victorian society, the preserve of the super-rich (and even then, dental hygiene was not guaranteed).
sentences.translation: 在维多利亚时代，一副闪闪发亮的健康、干净、整齐的“珍珠白”牙齿是非常罕见的，只有超级富豪才能拥有（即便如此，在那个时代，口腔卫生无法得到保证）。
